dao.name: CHK_CUST_TYPE_RF_IS_EXIST_CUST_MN
dao.statement: select count(*) as cust_mn_count from cust_mn where athena_id = trim(:athena_id) and type_cod = trim(:type_cod) and rownum = 1

dao.name: CHK_CONSTRACT_STA_IS_EXIST_CUST_MN
dao.statement: select count(*) custmncount from cust_mn where athena_id =? and contract_sta = ? and rownum = 1
